title: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: Cake: 2 cups flour, 2 cups sugar, ¾ cup cocoa powder, 2 tsp baking soda, 1 tsp salt, 1 cup vegetable oil, 1 cup buttermilk, 2 eggs, 1 cup hot coffee
Frosting: 1 cup butter, 4 cups powdered sugar, ½ cup cocoa, ¼ cup heavy cream, 2 tsp vanilla
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F. Grease two 9-inch pans.
Whisk flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, salt.
Add oil, buttermilk, eggs. Beat 2 minutes.
Stir in hot coffee (batter will be thin).
Cool 10 minutes, turn out onto racks.
Frosting: Beat butter until fluffy. Add sugar, cocoa, cream, vanilla.
notes: Batter is very thin - that's correct.
